INSERT INTO CRAFWORK_CHANGE_RECORD_PLM ( ID, VOUCHER_NO, PROD_NO, MID_PROD_NO, CRAFWORK_ID, CHANGE_FLAG, CHANGE_ITEM, OLD_VALUE, NEW_VALUE, CHANGE_EMP, UPD_DATE, DELETED, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, COMPANY_ID, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_BY ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{voucherNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{midProdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crafworkId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{changeFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{changeItem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oldValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{newValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{changeEmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
SELECT SEQ_CRAFWORK_CHANGE_RECORD_PLM.nextval as id FROM dual
mapper.update:
UPDATE CRAFWORK_CHANGE_RECORD_PLM
VOUCHER_NO = #{voucherNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROD_NO = #{prodNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MID_PROD_NO = #{midProdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CRAFWORK_ID = #{crafworkId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CHANGE_FLAG = #{changeFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHANGE_ITEM = #{changeItem,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OLD_VALUE = #{oldValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NEW_VALUE = #{newValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHANGE_EMP = #{changeEmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPD_DATE = #{updDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
